page.title: 02A DAY IN THE LIFE OF JONI
page.content:
A typical day for me begins by being wakened at eight o clock by my Mum. I often doze off again until 8.30. Getting up I wash, then sit down to breakfast of cereal and orange juice . At 8.50 I set off for school which starts at 9 o' clock. In class, spelling,ten a day,reading 360 scheme are completed before play time at 10.30. During this I play with most of the girls in my class at "jump, split,jump", which is elastic bands joined together.
After play-time we do maths until lunch time ,when I go home to have soup a ham sandwich and coca-cola. In the afternoon I do project work until 3.30 when I go home. Changing my clothes I go jogging with my friend Amanda, until I'm called in for tea.
